BREAKTHROUGH

This is the result of building something for months. Breakthrough was, without doubt, my hardest track to finish. I struggled all the time picking the right sounds and making an engaging arrengement. Fortunately, things developed as expected and the track was finished. I wish we can make another big premiere.
